title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
description: The bug report did not provide a description of the issue. The title suggests that there is a problem with the 'Close all saved' functionality, but no further details are given.
OB: The bug report does not mention the observed behavior.
EB: It should be clarified that the expected behavior is for the 'Close all saved' functionality to close all open files without any changes being made. As mentioned in the title, this is not happening consistently.
SR: The bug report does not provide steps to reproduce the issue. The steps to reproduce should include the specific actions or conditions required to encounter the problem.
